title: Moroccan lamb and chickpea tagine
ingredients: ['800g diced shoulder of lamb', '2 (400g) tins chickpeas, drained and rinsed', '1 large red onion, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '2 carrots, trimmed and cut in thirds', '900ml chicken or lamb stock', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '1/4 teaspoon saffron threads', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '2 teaspoons ground ginger', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '300g prunes or dried apricots', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 handful chopped fresh coriander']
